title: Future Plans
description: Learn A2-level future expressions with 要 / 會 / 打算.

steps.pinyin: wǒ míng tiān yào qù shì zhōng xīn.
steps.english_hint: I'm going to the city center tomorrow.

steps.teacher: 我下週會開始新的課程。
expected_answer: 我下週會開始新的課程。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xià zhōu huì kāi shǐ xīn de kè chéng.
steps.english_hint: I will start a new course next week.

steps.pinyin: wǒ dǎ suàn qù cān guān bó wù guǎn.
steps.english_hint: I plan to visit the museum.

steps.teacher: 我明天會搭地鐵去公司。
expected_answer: 我明天會搭地鐵去公司。
steps.pinyin: wǒ míng tiān huì dā dì tiě qù gōng sī.
steps.english_hint: I will take the metro to work tomorrow.

steps.teacher: 我週末打算跟朋友見面。
expected_answer: 我週末打算跟朋友見面。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhōu mò dǎ suàn gēn péng yǒu jiàn miàn.
steps.english_hint: I plan to meet friends this weekend.

steps.pinyin: xià gè yuè wǒ huì qù lǚ xíng.
wǒ dǎ suàn xué xīn de yǔ yán.
steps.english_hint: I plan to learn a new language.

steps.teacher: 我明天要早起，因為有重要的會議。
expected_answer: 我明天要早起，因為有重要的會議。
steps.pinyin: wǒ míng tiān yào zǎo qǐ, yīn wèi yǒu zhòng yào de huì yì.
steps.english_hint: I need to wake up early tomorrow because I have an important meeting.

steps.pinyin: wǒ xià zhōu huì huàn xīn de shǒu jī.
steps.english_hint: I will change to a new phone next week.

steps.teacher: 我打算學會自己做早餐。
expected_answer: 我打算學會自己做早餐。
steps.pinyin: wǒ dǎ suàn xué huì zì jǐ zuò zǎo cān.
steps.english_hint: I plan to learn to make my own breakfast.

review.summary: You learned natural A2 future sentences.
